name: RoadSport 4754 'B' Series Premier Splashguards
short_description: Molded from heavy-duty material to original equipment specifications, stays flexible down to -40f (-40c), will not crack or discolor
Constructed of heavy-duty material and made tough to protect
Protects small trucks and van finishes against road wear
Supplied with installation instructions and mounting hardware; packaged one pair per display card
Made from O.E. approved materials, the B-Series Premier splashguards are best suited to down-sized trucks, vans, SUVs and crossover vehicles
product_description: Introducing the Premier Fit Splash Guard B, a top-of-the-line, sturdy mud flap and splash guard solution for vehicle owners who take pride in maintaining their ride's pristine condition. These universal fit splash guards are suitable for cars, trucks, SUVs, trailers, and RVs, offering comprehensive protection for drivers who value their vehicle's appearance and performance. Constructed from heavy-duty material, these splash guards are built to last and provide enduring protection. They not only protect your vehicle from mud, dirt, and debris but also contribute to its overall visual appeal. The Premier Fit Splash Guard B comes with all required mounting hardware for an easy and convenient DIY installation. Save time and money by avoiding professional services and upgrading your vehicle with minimal effort. Experience the advantages of lasting protection against stone chips and road debris with these high-quality mud flaps. Acting as a barrier, they help prevent unsightly damage to your vehicle's paint job, ensuring its value is retained over time. Designed for reliable all-season performance, these mud flaps can handle harsh weather conditions, offering consistent protection throughout the year. No matter the terrain or season, the Premier Fit Splash Guard B delivers dependable and lasting protection for your vehicle. Upgrade your vehicle with the Premier Fit Splash Guard B, a sleek and durable mud flap solution that provides all-season protection against the elements. With its universal fit, robust construction, and simple installation, these splash guards are the perfect addition to any vehicle. Keep your ride looking like new and enjoy the satisfaction of driving a well-protected, impeccably maintained vehicle. Order your Premier Fit Splash Guard B today and experience the difference it can make for your ride.

name: LUVERNE 251223 Universal Front or Rear 12-Inch x 23-Inch Textured Rubber Mud Guards with Stainless Steel Plates, 2 Flaps
short_description: RELIABLE PROTECTION. The heavy-duty construction of these truck mud flaps helps protect your vehicle on the road and in the field, blocking mud and gravel spray from marring the rocker panels and sides of the vehicle

UNIQUE FLASH. These mudflaps feature unique 18-gauge stainless steel splash guard plates on the bottom edge. These plates are polished for a stylish accent, and they help prolong the life of the mud guards

HIGHLY DURABLE. Constructed from 3/8-inch recycled rubber, these mud guards are built to withstand tough jobs. Their textured surface also helps hide scuffs, scratches and grime, maintaining a cleaner look
EASY TO INSTALL. These universal mud flaps offer easy installation on your truck, Jeep or SUV. They come with corrosion-resistant hardware and strong, galvanized steel brackets
COMPLETE KIT. This package of mud guards includes two mud flaps with plates and mounting hardware for a complete installation on your vehicle
product_description: For the front or rear of the vehicle, LUVERNE Textured Rubber Mud Guards add style and body protection no matter where the road leads. These mud flaps are constructed from heavy-duty black rubber that stands up to road debris and sheds water with ease. They also feature 18-gauge stainless steel plates to help protect the bottom edge and extend the life of the mud flaps. Whether you're on the job or off-roading through the wilderness, it doesn't take long for rocks and other debris to wreak havoc on the body of your vehicle. LUVERNE Textured Rubber Mud Guards are the perfect solution for maintaining that pristine look. With their 3/8" thick, recycled rubber construction, they easily deflect everything from mud to gravel, protecting the body of your truck or SUV from scratches, chips and dents. LUVERNE Mud Guards are also made to add a stylish accent to your vehicle, featuring stainless steel plates along the bottom edge of each flap. The plates are made from 18-gauge stainless steel to provide a heavy-duty, rust-free shield, and they feature a bright, high-polish finish for a long-lasting shine. The textured finish of the rubber flaps is also designed to easily hide minor scuffs and scratches and maintain a clean appearance. . For an easy installation and a fit for your unique vehicle, LUVERNE Mud Guards are offered in multiple sizes (NOTE: Mud Guards are designed for vehicle-specific application. Please see the application information to find which size will fit your vehicle). They are available to fit both the front and rear of the vehicle and install with corrosion-resistant fasteners and high-strength steel mounting brackets with a galvanized finish. We also offer a universal size without stainless steel plates, giving you the freedom to select whichever look best suits your vehicle.
